beer.beer_description: A series that showcases the perfect fusion of beer and wine. Birra Vino Rosso rested on Shiraz skins from the esteemed Seville Estate, to impart floral and fruit flavours into the crisp beer base. Blush red in colour with soft, luscious wine cues, and a refreshingly spritzy finish.

items.checkin_comment:
Carwyn Canvent 2025 #20:
Essentially a red grape flavoured saison. Lively and bubbly with a nice dry finish. Very pleasant.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what‚Äôs on tap! That's 385 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 78!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 495 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 100! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
